definition: powder from the ground seeds and pods of the carob tree
details:
noun
- powder from the ground seeds and pods of the carob tree
= synonyms: carob powder
- evergreen Mediterranean tree with edible pods
= example: evergreen Mediterranean tree with edible pods
= synonyms: algarroba, carob bean tree, carob tree
- long pod containing small beans and sweetish edible pulp
= synonyms: algarroba, carob bean, algarroba bean, locust bean, locust pod
